key_risks: Intense competition from traditional retailers and e-commerce giants
Global supply chain disruptions impacting product availability and margins
Regulatory complexity across 13 countries and territories
controversies: Scrutiny over environmental practices, particularly single-use plastic waste
Pressure to improve sustainability initiatives and reduce carbon emissions
environmental_issues: Single-use plastic waste and compliance with regulatory changes
Need to enhance waste management and reduce carbon emissions
governance_issues: Influence of significant public company ownership on decision-making processes
